publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4233 John Lam ont: Borders Common Ridings—That the Parliament recognises the cultural and historic importance of the 11 common ridings and festivals across the Scottish Borders, including those at Hawick, Jedburgh, Selkirk, Yetholm, Kelso, Duns and Coldstream ; notes both the rich traditions of these events, dating back to the 16th century, and also their modern-day value in bringing communities together; further congratulates this year’s principals on their appointment, and wishes organisers and participants every success and enjoyment during the festivities of 2009. Supported by : Elaine Murray*, David McLetchie*, Nanette Milne*, Margaret Mitchell*, Mary Scanlon*, Bill Aitken*, Murdo Fraser*, Jam ie McGrigor*, Christine Graham e*
S3M-4233 Borders Common Ridings (lodged on 26 May 2009) Robin Harper*, Aileen Campbell*, Jackson Carlaw*, Karen Whitefield*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-4233 Borders Common Ridings (lodged on 26 May 2009) John Scott*, Ted Brocklebank*

S3M-4233 John Lamont: Borders Common Ridings—That the Parliament recognises the cultural and historic importance of the 11 common ridings and festivals across the Scottish Borders, including those at Hawick, Jedburgh, Selkirk, Yetholm, Kelso, Duns and Coldstream; notes both the rich traditions of these events, dating back to the 16th century, and also their modern-day value in bringing communities together; further congratulates this year’s principals on their appointment, and wishes organisers and participants every success and enjoyment during the festivities of 2009. Supported by: Elaine Murray, David McLetchie, Nanette Milne, Margaret Mitchell, Mary Scanlon, Bill Aitken, Murdo Fraser, Jamie McGrigor, Christine Grahame, Robin Harper, Aileen Campbell, Jackson Carlaw, Karen Whitefield, Gil Paterson, John Scott, Ted Brocklebank
S3M-4233 Borders Common Ridings (lodged on 26 May 2009) Derek Brownlee*
S3M-4233 Borders Common Ridings (lodged on 26 May 2009) Stuart McMillan*
S3M-4233 Borders Common Ridings (lodged on 26 May 2009) Peter Peacock*
S3M-4233 Borders Common Ridings (lodged on 26 May 2009) Annabel Goldie*
